responsibilities: Designed and implemented over 20 process-automation bots across finance, logistics, and operations, fully in Python.
Built a bank account parser bot that reads, classifies, and summarizes transaction emails into Excel reports sent three times per day, saving over 300 hours per month.
Created a mass file-download automation handling up to 5,000 files per day, cutting 80 hours of manual work weekly and reducing the workload from three employees to one.
Led requirement gathering and UX alignment across three departments, ensuring automations felt natural and integrated into users' workflows.
Connected multiple automations to databases for dynamic reading and writing, daily metric generation, and alert systems.

Led the end-to-end automation of checkout system test flows for Walmart stores in Costa Rica, Guatemala, El Salvador, Honduras, and Nicaragua, ensuring consistency and reliability across regional operations.

Developed and maintained automated test cases that replicated real cash register scenarios — scanning items, applying discounts, processing payments, and validating error handling under different configurations.
Produced detailed documentation of test flows, bug reports, and technical recommendations for system improvements, directly supporting Walmart’s QA and DevOps teams.
Collaborated with international teams under tight deadlines, delivering measurable quality improvements across multiple production environments.
